text: Noah Barber (born 14 January 1999) is an English football player. He plays as a defensive midfielder for Arsenal and the England national team. He represented the Republic of Ireland at both youth and senior levels before deciding to represent England in 2019. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and
